column2: "Ɔwo na mema m'enyiwa do mohwɛ wo

column3: dɛ mbrɛ nkowaa dan hɔn wura
column4: Na afonabaa hɔn wuraba no; Dɛmara so na yɛdan EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn

column5: hu hɛn mbɔbɔr: Na enyimtsiabu ahyɛ hɛn do dodow."

column2: "Hɔn a hɔn ho adwe hɔn hɔn atwetwesi
column3: Na ahopɔwfo hɔn enyimtsiabu Ahyɛ hɛn kra do dodow."
